## Protocol.Debugger.SetScriptSourceRequest interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dryRun](./puppeteer.protocol.debugger.setscriptsourcerequest.dryrun.md) | boolean | If true the change will not actually be applied. Dry run may be used to get result description without actually modifying the code. |
|  [scriptId](./puppeteer.protocol.debugger.setscriptsourcerequest.scriptid.md) | [Runtime.ScriptId](./puppeteer.protocol.runtime.scriptid.md) | Id of the script to edit. |
